mapper.select: select requirement_id, requirement_content, requirement_author, create_date, update_date, requirement_title from "SmartTeam".requirement_management where requirement_id = #{requirementId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select requirement_id, requirement_content, requirement_author, create_date, update_date, requirement_title from "SmartTeam".requirement_management
select requirement_id, requirement_content, requirement_author, create_date, update_date, requirement_title from "SmartTeam".requirement_management where requirement_author = #{requirementId}
